data.comment: Watford kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! Kieffer Moore gives Cardiff a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Vicarage Road.
It's Cardiff with the kick-off after the break.
The home team have replaced Jeremy Ngakia with Kiko Femenia. This is the first substitution made today by Vladan Ivic.
In the minute 59, Sheyi Ojo (Cardiff) has received a first yellow card.
Cardiff's Joe Ralls has been booked in Watford.
Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a second substitution, with Will Hughes replacing Tom Cleverley.
In the minute 66, Watford make their third substitution with Domingos Quina replacing Ken Sema.
Neil Harris is making the team's first substitution at Vicarage Road with Junior Hoilett replacing Mark Harris.
Marlon Pack is replacing Sheyi Ojo for Cardiff at Vicarage Road.
In the minute 81, Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a fourth substitution, with Stipe Perica replacing Ben Wilmot.
The away team replace Joe Ralls with Souleymane Bamba.
Robert Glatzel is on a sub for Kieffer Moore for Cardiff.
In the minute 88, Gavin Whyte is replacing Harry Wilson for the away team.
Stephen Martin blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
Stipe Perica is booked for the home team.
